p: Thereafter, the scores assigned to each indicator were averaged for all indicators evaluated within each attribute to provide an overall score for each surveillance attribute assessed in this study. An overall score for the surveillance system was obtained by averaging the scores of all evaluated indicators as previously described [ 18â€“ 21]. All data generated by the surveillance system during the review period were included in the evaluation. The analysis was implemented using Stata version 14.2 (StataCorp, College Station, Texas, USA).
